entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
